verses.roman:
tumi śuni' śuni' raha mauna mātra dhari'
hṛdaye ki āche tomāra, bujhite nā pāri

synonyms: tumi—You; śuni'-hearing; śuni'-hearing; raha—keep; mauna—silence; mātra—only; dhari'-holding; hṛdaye—in the heart; ki—what; āche—there is; tomāra—Your; bujhite—to understand; nā—not; pāri—am able.
translation: "You are hearing again and again, yet You keep silent. I cannot understand what is actually within Your mind."
